properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 1 at 2:42AM MST until March 2 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW AT TIMES WILL IMPACT AREAS ALONG AND
WEST OF THE LARAMIE RANGE SUNDAY THROUGH MONDAY MORNING...

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7
inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Whiteout conditions at
times due to combination of heavy snow...strong winds and
blowing snow.

* WHERE...Central Carbon County to include Rawlins and Sinclair.

* WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Transportation may be severely impacted with snow
covered roads...drifting snow and very poor visibility. Plan on
slippery road conditions. Periods of blowing snow possible
Sunday afternoon through early Sunday evening.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST MONDAY
